Html:
It's possible think to build a version of Prism Framework in Javascript ? No Wpf, no Silverlight but manage Regions, Views, Module etc in a Single Page Web App.

MVVM with Knockout and Prism for Javascript builded upon. There is a RoadMap for this ?

Hi,

I am currently not aware of any plans regarding a version of Prism for JavaScript in the near feature. You can find the pattern & practices team's current road map in their web site:

  • pattern & practices: Developer Center Home

As a side note, I believe you could also check another pattern & practices project named Silk:

  • http://silk.codeplex.com/

Silk is a guidance for developing single page applications using ASP.NET MVC and JavaScript. Although it does not have a custom framework, Silk provides guidance about several topics like pub-sub patterns, modularity, etc, as well as a reference implementation application portraying them that could become handy when developing web apps using the aforementioned technologies.

Regards,

Damian Cherubini
http://blogs.southworks.net/dcherubini
